thread.section_title: Bento&co評価／レビュー | お客様は Bento&coの評価／レビューをしました。 | bentoandco.com
thread.title: ami may
thread.title_full: Bento&co について 投稿者 ami may

author: ami may
title: ami may
text: I loved their products, they are of high quality. The system of purchase easy and simple, I made my payment without problem. Excellent customer service and incredibly fast shipping. The only problem I had even though I was advised it was the payment of the customs and taxes because I chose Free shipping method. It was very high, almost more than half of the total of my purchase. So if you use free shipping, you should be aware of the payment you will make when you receive your order.
